descriptionHtml:
This is an intentionally ugly, useless, and generally strange npc that you would probably want to get rid of as soon as possible.

Its intended purpose is to be sacrificed at the Shrine of Boethia for the "Boethia's Calling" quest so that you don't have to give up one of the legitimately useful followers.

It resides in Candlehearth Hall in Windhelm and you can recruit it from the beginning.

If you're wondering why I'm referring to the follower as "it" and not "he" or "she"... well... if you install it you'll understand...


P.S. This mod is mostly for me, I'm aware that there are probably mods similar to this one, but I'm too lazy to look for one.

P.P.S. Yay first upload
author: EMPeace
